newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine Works Secretary Bastos resigns - agency.
newsitem.headline: Argentine Works Secretary Bastos resigns - agency.

text.p: Argentina's Public Works Secretary Carlos Bastos presented his resignation on Tuesday to President Carlos Menem, the state-owned Telam news agency reported.
"Bastos presented his unrefusable resignation to President Carlos Menem tonight," said an aide to Bastos quoted by Telam.
Bastos, closely associated to former Economy Minister Domingo Cavallo, has been in control of the troubled privatisation of the giant Yacyreta hydroelectric dam.
Telam did not say why Bastos had resigned.
